Name: Japanese Cocktail
Ingredients: 10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist..
REGAL STIR all ingredients (including lemon zest).
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Lightly sweetened and diluted cognac, flavoured with almond and a hint of spice.
History: Adapted from a recipe first published in Jerry "The Professor" Thomas' 1862 Bartender's Guide . This is one of the few cocktails in the book which is believed to be his own creation.
